name: Time Chasers
description:
Hello Chaser,

Your goal is to reach the jump window before it closes. You have to hurry, the time is short. But don't worry, as long as you as keep accelerating our time dilating technology will get you there. Release the throttle and you timer will drop. 

Good Luck!

Control the vehicle with WASD, accelerate with the Space Bar. P to pause.

Game created for the Epic Mega Jam 2020

Game Credits

Game Designer - Daniel Sabogal

Game Programmer - Shawn Patrick Kyler II.

Environment Artist - Pedro Burgos Santana

3D Modeler - Joshua "The" Fenby
